job_description:
We are looking for 
Role: Java Developer -only Ex Morgan Stanely 
Location: New York, NY 
 
Qualifications
 
Required:
 
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).
 
3‚Äì7 years of hands-on experience with Java (Java 8 or later).
 
Experience with Spring / Spring Boot frameworks.
 
Proficiency with RESTful APIs, JSON, and microservices-based development.
 
Familiarity with relational databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle) and ORM tools like Hibernate or JPA.
 
Knowledge of version control systems such as Git.
 
Strong problem-solving and communication skills.

Please share profiles to praveen@imrsoft.com
ai_prompt:
Write a good email to recuriter for the job description provided. Make sure to add new lines in between each para, not limited to 1 line but 3-4 lines after each para.

Please provide:
1. A concise, professional subject line
2. A personalized email body that:
   - Expresses genuine interest in the position
   - Highlights relevant skills and experience from the resume that match the job description
   - Demonstrates knowledge of the role
   - Includes a clear call to action
   - Maintains a professional yet personable tone
3. Body should start with for which position I am reaching out for. then what are my skills from jd that I have in bullet points style. lastly find my attached resume like closing statement.
4. If the jd mentioned recuriter name, start with Hello [recruiter name], else start with just Hello,
Do not send subject line in body.

Format your response as JSON with two fields: "subject" and "body".

Subject should be
Application for [role name] (Location).

Signature at end of email should be.
Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434


Example response:


I hope you‚Äôre doing well.

Thank you for sharing the details of the Senior Java Microservices Engineer (Cloud-Native | Reactive Systems) position in Sunnyvale, CA. I‚Äôm very interested in this opportunity and believe my experience aligns closely with the role requirements.

I have over 10 years of experience in designing and developing scalable, cloud-native, and microservices-based enterprise applications using Java (8‚Äì17), Spring Boot, and distributed systems architecture. My technical background also includes hands-on expertise with Kubernetes, Docker, GCP, Azure, and messaging frameworks such as Kafka.

Some highlights from my experience include:

- Designing reactive, fault-tolerant microservices using Spring Boot, WebFlux, and Camel.

- Deploying and scaling microservices on Kubernetes and cloud platforms (Azure & GCP).

- Working with Oracle, Cassandra, and Cosmos DB for distributed data processing.

- Implementing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Git, ensuring high code quality through JUnit, Mockito, and TDD practices.

- Strong focus on performance tuning, multithreading, and high availability in distributed systems.


Please find my updated resume attached for your review. I would love the opportunity to discuss how my experience aligns with your client‚Äôs needs.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

{Signature}
email_subject: Application for Java Developer -only Ex Morgan Stanley (New York, NY)

job_description:

Client: Healthcare

job_description:
üöÄ Position: Java Full Stack Engineer
 üìç Location: Plano, TX (Hybrid ‚Äì Locals Only)
 üïí Duration: 12+ Months Contract-to-Hire
 üíº Visa: H4EAD
 üìß Email: shruthi.v@staffbees.com
Role Overview:
We are looking for a highly skilled Java Full Stack Engineer with strong experience in microservices, cloud deployment, and modern front-end frameworks. The ideal candidate will contribute to designing and developing scalable logistics systems for order processing, warehouse management, and shipment tracking.
Key Responsibilities:
Design, build, test, and deploy Spring Boot microservices for logistics and operations.
Develop and maintain responsive UIs using Angular (v10+), focusing on seamless UX.
Write and optimize complex SQL queries (DB2) and perform database design.
Implement event-driven pipelines with Kafka for real-time data flow.
Work with GCP services such as GKE, Compute Engine, and Cloud Storage.
Build middleware and APIs integrating with legacy COBOL systems.
Participate in Agile ceremonies ‚Äì daily stand-ups, sprint planning, retrospectives.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams and mentor junior developers.
Required Skills & Experience:
5+ years of hands-on experience in Java Full Stack development.
3+ years of Spring Boot & microservices experience.
Strong Angular (v10+), TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3 front-end experience.
Expertise in Kafka, REST APIs, and message-driven architecture.
Strong DB2 and SQL optimization knowledge.
Experience deploying on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) ‚Äì GKE, Pub/Sub, Cloud SQL.
Familiarity with CI/CD, Git, Jenkins, Docker, and Kubernetes.
Solid understanding of Agile/Scrum SDLC practices.
Preferred Qualifications:
Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs in Computer Science or related field.
GCP or Java certifications (preferred).
Experience in logistics/supply chain systems ‚Äì shipment, order, or inventory management.
üì© Interested candidates (Locals to Plano, TX only) can share their updated resumes at
 üëâ shruthi.v@staffbees.com

job_description:
Hi,
Greetings of the day,

Title: Full stack Developer (Java + ReactJS)
Location: Bothell, WA (only Local candidates f2f interview required)
 
Job Description:
Candidate must be very strong in Java Microservice, should be able to debug prod issue, well aware of debugging process checking ELK/Splunk/QM session logs etc.
 
Minimum Qualification and Skills
‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs Degree program in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
‚Ä¢ Extremely motivated, highly passionate, and curious about new technologies. Take pride in your work and strive to achieve incredible results and possess superb communication and planning skills.
‚Ä¢ 6+ years of proven experience building sophisticated applications and APIs in Cloud and hybrid cloud environments at large scale in Javascript and React JS.
‚Ä¢ Experience building applications using Generative AI, LLMs & Copilots.
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of experience developing applications utilizing relational databases and / or no SQL databases as part of the overall application architecture.
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of experience in implementing caching techniques for a web application.
‚Ä¢ Ability to work successfully with multi-functional teams, principals, and architects. Coordinates optimally across organizational boundaries and geographies.
‚Ä¢ 5+ Experience with front-end frameworks like Angular or React.
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of strong background of object-oriented design principles and design patterns.
‚Ä¢ Expert knowledge and experience working with asynchronous message processing, stream processing and event driven computing.
‚Ä¢ Comfortable working in a fast-paced, highly collaborative environment
‚Ä¢ Communication skills, both written and verbal, are extremely important for this role and required for success. This role requires 7+ years of corporate work experience in a complex technical environment. Proven skills communicating across multiple platforms.
Technical Skills:
React.js, Node.js, Next JS, Micro Front-End architecture, Typescript, Graph QL, Bootstrap.js, HTML5, XML, CSS3, JavaScript, REST services, NoSql technologies (Cassandra/Mongo DB), Spring boot, Kafka/MQ, Redis, Splunk, Azure / AWS, Prometheus/Grafana, Git, Jira, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes

Please share me resume on,
sonu.chaurasiya@zodiac-solutions.com

job_description:
Hi,
Connections,
Greetings of the day

Job Title: Senior Java Backend Developer 
Location: NJ, NY, IL, WI, 
Experience: 10+ Years for GC = 13+ Years 
Visa: Independent Visa (GC- EAD, H4EAD, USC) No H1B


About the Role:

You‚Äôll play a key role in architecting, designing, and developing backend solutions that power mission-critical enterprise applications.


Key Responsibilities:
Design, develop, and maintain high-performance, secure, and scalable backend services using Java (8/11/17+)
Collaborate with architects, product managers, and front-end teams to deliver end-to-end solutions
Implement RESTful APIs / Microservices and integrate with various third-party services
Optimize application performance by identifying bottlenecks and improving system efficiency
Work with databases (SQL / NoSQL), ensuring high data integrity and availability
Lead code reviews, enforce best practices, and mentor junior developers
Utilize cloud platforms (AWS / Azure / GCP) to deploy and manage backend solutions
Participate in the entire SDLC ‚Äì from requirement gathering to deployment and support
Ensure security, scalability, and reliability of backend systems

Required Skills & Experience:
‚úÖ 9+ years of professional experience in backend development with Java (Core Java, J2EE)
‚úÖ Strong expertise in Spring Boot, Hibernate/JPA, RESTful API, and Microservices Architecture
‚úÖ Proficiency in SQL / NoSQL databases such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Cassandra
‚úÖ Good understanding of Cloud platforms (AWS / Azure / GCP) and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
‚úÖ Experience with CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitLab, or similar)
‚úÖ Solid understanding of data structures, algorithms, multithreading, and design patterns
‚úÖ Familiarity with messaging queues (Kafka, RabbitMQ) is a plus
‚úÖ Strong knowledge of API security, OAuth2.0, JWT, and performance optimization
‚úÖ Excellent problem-solving, communication, and team-leadership skills

Please share me the Updated resume to below Email
ID vasu35426@gmail.com

job_description:
HIRING ALERT! üö® ( No GC Profiles)
 We're seeking a highly skilled Java back-end developer with 8-10 years of experience to join our technology team in Plano, TX, or Atlanta, GA.

This is a long-term contract opportunity requiring a hybrid Day 1 onsite presence (local candidates only; in-person interview required).

We need a strong back-end developer with solid experience in Java 17+ and Spring Boot 5+, coupled with proficiency in React.js for front-end tasks.
Key Skills We're Looking For:
Java 17+, Spring Boot, microservices, and REST API development.
Reactive Programming (Reactor, WebFlux, or Vert.x) is a big plus.
Experience with React.js, JavaScript, and HTML5/CSS3.
Hands-on with SQL/NoSQL databases (PostgreSQL, Oracle, Couchbase, MongoDB, Cassandra).
Familiarity with message brokers (Kafka, RabbitMQ) and CI/CD tools (Jenkins, Docker).
Strong problem-solving skills and Agile methodology experience.

The Role: You will be crucial in designing and implementing scalable Java-based applications and RESTful microservices, optimizing performance, and collaborating closely with cross-functional teams.

Interview Process: HackerRank Test & Final Technical Round.

Local Candidates Only.

Interested? Please share your resume with aswitha@vedhansolutions.com.
